category.name: Solution-Specific.Mechatronics
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: Implemented_ByRules
preference.preference_description: Defines any supported valid primary/secondary object combination allowed for the Implemented_By Generic Relationship Management (GRM) relation. GRM rules contain a primary type, a relation type, and multiple secondary types. If no rules are found for any of the super types, the primary-secondary combination is considered invalid for Implemented_By relationship. The rules listed for this preference should not be removed. If required, sites should append the secondary list OR add rules for their particular primary types. Valid Values: Accepts multiple strings as values.Constraints are defined in the following format: primaryObjectType:secondaryObjectType1,secondaryObjectType2 The object types are any valid ImanType type.
